title: Demon In The Crawl Space | True Ghost Stories
description:
When it comes to investigating the paranormal, the team of Brian, Robert, and Jeff of Pee Dee Paranormal have pretty much seen it all over the last twenty-some years. From a man whose home was infested with a demonic force after playing with an Ouija Board. Also, a school that encouraged bullying and harmful behavior then turned into an asylum that housed tortured souls for decades and much more. Today we hear about their drive to find answers about why the supernatural live among us. 

In Part 2, EXCLUSIVE TO GRAVE KEEPERS! Become one here: http://www.patreon.com/thegravetalks

What is the difference between inviting things in and asking questions through a spirit box?

Has any member of this team ever had an attachment follow them home?

How often do people die, directly or indirectly, from the paranormal? 


Please support us on Patreon and get access to our AD-FREE ARCHIVE, ADVANCE EPISODES & MORE at http://www.patreon.com/thegravetalks
